text: The Good Guys, Inc. was a retailer of consumer electronics stores in the West Coast of the United States. At their height they operated 71 stores in California, Nevada, Oregon and Washington. In 2003, The Good Guys was bought out by CompUSA. In 2005-2006, all of their locations closed. ==References == Category:1973 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in California Category:Electronics
title: Good Guys (American retailer)
